testcase.system-out:
Clicked the 'Wallet' button. Successfully clicked the 'Withdraw' button. Clicked on USDC TextView ‚úÖ Clicked on 'Send via Phone Number' option ‚úÖ User name text 'Bandaru Yoganandham' is visible. ‚úÖ Entered withdraw amount: 0.1 ‚úÖ Clicked on the Submit button. ‚úÖ Successfully entered PIN: 2580 üî¢ Entered PIN: 2580 ‚úÖ Clicked on 'Submit' button in UCPI page. ‚úÖ No error message displayed after entering PIN: 2580 ‚ùå An error occurred while entering the withdrawal amount: Expected condition failed: waiting for element to be clickable: Proxy element for: DefaultElementLocator 'By.xpath: //android.widget.EditText[@text='Minimum 10 USD']' (tried for 20 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)
üì∏ Screenshot:

‚úÖ Transaction Success Message Displayed: Transaction Successfull ‚è± Execution Time for verifyTransactionSuccess(): 6023 ms ‚úÖSuccessfully clicked on the cancel button , Clicked on USDC TextView cryptoNetwork element is clickable Clicked on cryptoNetwork element Crypto address entered successfully: 0xA5385D4052De470350DAcf00eC68fb0BFaeD4f29 ‚úÖ Entered withdraw amount: 0.1 ‚úÖ Clicked on the Submit button. ‚úÖ Successfully entered PIN: 2580 üî¢ Entered PIN: 2580 ‚úÖ Clicked on 'Submit' button in UCPI page. ‚úÖ No error message displayed after entering PIN: 2580 ‚ùå Error: Submit button not found or not clickable. An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters.
